website_summaries.verdict: Buyers loved the versatility of this 2-in-1 bench/table combo.
pros: Easily switches from a bench to a table and back again
Sturdy, lightweight wood that holds weight well
Under an hour to assemble for most
Features a hole to fit an umbrella
cons: The wood isn't pressure treated, so plan on weatherproofing it
Some found the assembly to be difficult, with both the instructions and the included tool falling short

customer_reviews.title: Cute but caused domestic discord
customer_reviews.text: I thought this looked like such a cute table/bench, and it truly is!! My husband tried to talk me out of it because there were reviews talking about the quality of the wood. I ordered it any way. It was super easy for me to put together (I've been assembling future for YEARS). It is the perfect size for our family to have meals on the deck. The problem was the slats for the seat(s) started to split, flake and come apart after only 1 week. The company has been working with us and has a solution to resolve the issue but now I have to listen to my husband tell me he told me so. :/
customer_reviews.author: Beaker

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bench/table. I was skeptical because of the price but ordered it and am so glad I did. Little tricky to assemble because pictures could be clearer. But im a 74 year old woman and got the job done! Its perfect for my small lower level patio. My grand kids love playing games on it and having lunch. When they go home I have a great bench. Very sturdy just needs a spray of sealer for waterproofing.
customer_reviews.author: cappi

customer_reviews.title: The idea of having a table and a bench in one looks great!
customer_reviews.text: This looks great! Love the space saving on the deck! Gave 4 star one of the armrests has a slight crack.Will have to watch it for breakage. You must stain and varnish to protect this from the weather. Over all sturdiness is great holds 2 large adults on the bench. And awards 4 smaller adults for the table. Putting this together was straight foward, except there are no spare parts. So don't loose any of the nuts or washers. Lost a bit had to find one in my spare parts jar.
customer_reviews.author: m.laver

customer_reviews.title: Very well made table/bench
customer_reviews.text: It arrived well packed. A quick check revealed all parts were present. The pieces are labeled right and left side, but I didn’t see that until I assembled some parts on the wrong side. Once that was solved, assembly was quite easy. Nice wood, but I applied 2 coats of clear protectant to be sure the rain wouldn’t destroy it. The table sits 4 regular sized adults easily....probably 6 children. The bench... 2 adults comfortably. Well thought out design makes it doubly useful. 2 adults can move it easily. 1 adult can do the conversion from bench to table easily. We like it.
customer_reviews.author: David Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Great concept, poor execution
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of this item. Converting a table to a bench is probably the most useful item I have in my backyard. Assembling this item was quite easy. Took less than an hour and the manual was helpful. However, the quality of this product is reflected in its price tag. For $150, you get a pretty cool concept. But the material is not the best. I already started noticing cracks on the wood and other parts are starting to peel. This table is not weatherproof and will require a wood sealant to keep it from deteriorating. Overall, I love the concept and versatility of this product but it could have been executed better.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Phan

customer_reviews.title: Snap and Boom!
customer_reviews.text: Disabled, I still got it together in two days, by myself, with the help of work bench.
customer_reviews.author: Larry A. Watters

customer_reviews.title: Great Item, the assembly instructions should be more accurate
customer_reviews.text: I am a very handy person and never have problems assembling anything, this was easy to assemble once you figured it out. The instructions should’ve been more precise. There are 2 pieces that are easily mixed up, you have a 50/50 Chance of screwing it up and trying to figure out what went wrong... once figured out what went wrong halfway into the assembly, I had to take it apart and put it back together. Once it is assembled it is a fantastic item
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B

customer_reviews.title: Awesome piece of functional furniture!
customer_reviews.text: I put this together by myself in about an hour! It helps to have a drill, I wouldn’t put in the screws with just a screwdriver. The wood color is really pretty, I thought it was going to be a more unfinished yellow color. There was one small knick on the table top from delivery, but not damaged enough that I would want to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph and Carlee

customer_reviews.title: 2 in 1 Backyard Winner!
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with my bench / table. It seemed to be easy to assemble but I didn't do it but it didn't take him long. My friend took about an hour to complete and that's just because the directions didn't specify a piece clearly, so pay attention to the images. I love the color, it matches the picture exactly and most of all it is SO sturdy and easy to transform from a bench to seating. I highly recommend it to anyone that's trying to save space in their backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly F

customer_reviews.title: Bench/ Table
customer_reviews.text: I love it , I use it as a bench mostly and it is a space saver. The table is more suited for two adults but will seat 4
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to assemble and wonderful to use!
customer_reviews.text: It is god for 4 people as a table and 2-3 as a bench. I love it. It was easy to assemble and folds up as bench for storage under awning so it doesn't get wet. I use it as a desk to work on and as a picnic table as well. Get it, you'll love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Joy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: I am very please with the picnic table. Perfect for my small patio. BUT...... WHERE THERE WAS A PLACE FOR 6 SCREWS ... NO SCREW HOLES WERE DRILLED. TRUE....We do not live in a perfect world, but this is a big disappointment for me in this product. Therefore, I will only give this product a 3 star rating and what a shame that this was not seen during an inspection as this is a very nice table. Made in China ? ? ? ...... What's new ? ? .
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: We have a small porch and yard and I needed something that wasn't bulky. Y'all I cannot stress how amazing this purchase has been for me. WE LOVE IT! It really is the cutest bench. The size is PERFECT and then we pull it out into the yard for a cute picnic table. I'm so obsessed and so is my daughter, she just thinks its the coolest ! Perfect for our small home and family and certainly worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Great price, functionality, and cute!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat the price for such a genius, awesome product. Love the functionality. Very cute bench and awesome outdoor table! In my opinion, it can seat up to 4 people max. I have recommended this to family/ friends and received many impressed compliments. Will buy again if I need to!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loved it! We added waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved it! We added waterproof, cedar colored stain to it and it looks awesome! Definitely wouldn't expose it to the elements without the waterproofing, but, it's help up great on our covered porch so far! Very deep bench seating, very comfortable and feels sturdy as a picnic table, also!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren E. Wilmoth

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality of wood!! Won’t last!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited after spending time assembling and putting three layers of finish. However, after 2 weeks, I started to find wood splintering EVERYWHERE. I don’t know if it will last till the end of the season!
customer_reviews.author: Zachary G.

customer_reviews.title: A VERY HONEST REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This bench table is even better in person than the pictures. It is NOT weather treated, so you will need to add that step, and you 100% need two people to help prop up the table and hold into place while assembling. We used a drill and it was 100 times easier and reccomend. For the price, you can't beat it, but if you have to build this totally solo, with no drill or help, it might be too much trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Regan

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Wood is better quality than I expected. 30 minutes to put together and is sturdy. I weigh around 240lbs and feel comfortable sitting on this. I used spray on water seal as I am using this outside. I rely heavily on reviews when deciding to purchase, and would definitely say that I recommend this. Perfect for our small patio
customer_reviews.author: Raquel MacDonald

customer_reviews.title: I love you picnic table/bench
customer_reviews.text: The year I spent with this bench was one of the greatest of my life. I used it as a table inside my very small studio apartment. The fact that it folds up into a bench made it great for space management and just really cool. It was a pain in the ass to put together, but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: D. O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect this to be a heavy-duty piece, but it's really quite sturdy and looks great. It's small, but fits my space well. Assembly was easy and the transition from table to bench is a cinch (even though it didn't come with instructions about this). It's not a hard wood and I don't expect it will last forever, but I'm really pleased with it for now!
customer_reviews.author: David F. Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! We have to weather proof it, but the bench part is great! It has a really wide seat so it is super comfortable to sit on. Also, easily converts from a table to bench, I can do it all by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Cracks and splinters easily
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on this. Granted I had it a little over 2 months, but expected it not to crack or splinter so soon. Because it's beyond the 60 day guarantee, I lost the money paid for it. Good luck. I will never buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Nice but damaged
customer_reviews.text: It took me about 30 minutes to put together and really like how it looks and works, but it has damage on the top. The box didn't protect it in shipping and the factory "almost" put wood putty in few bad spots. I would get a replacement if I had bought it locally. UPDATE: I called BCP and they offered me a credit back of $50 so I took it. I guess I will put some more wood putty on it and call it good for now. I change my rating from 2 to 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Wally Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed my expectations...I ordered another one!
customer_reviews.text: This surpassed my expectations. It is well designed and easy to assemble and works flawlessly! I researched these for a while and found free plans online but after calculating the materials cost and time it would take I couldn't resist this one. Took about 40 min, to assemble while I watched the evening news. We use it on our pontoon boat and I like it so much I just ordered a second one.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Beede

customer_reviews.title: Smallish but very useful
customer_reviews.text: The bench did need to be finished with a protective stain for outside use. It fits on a small patio and the table is a bit narrow. It is perfect for children!
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Great for small yardage or patios
customer_reviews.text: We love this table. It has worked great especially since we dont have a real backyard just a large patio. Assembly was super easy and took my husband and I just under an hour to assemble with the kids running around. Now my husband's grandma wants to get her son one too.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect when the grandkids come over
customer_reviews.text: These sturdy benches are fine for adults, but when unfolded into picnic tables they are more suited for children. Our grandkids like them when we BBQ.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Central TX

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Decent table for what it's worth but thought it would be a bit stronger/sturdier than it was going to be.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice and convenient
customer_reviews.text: Looks perfect for a patio/garden. I used a protective transparent paint to make sure it won't be ruin by atmospheric conditions..
customer_reviews.author: Smarry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: It was so simple to put together and I’m a petite lady. It’s sturdy and looks amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellently engineered, very sturdy and quite attractive. Be prepared to stain in yourself however. Easily transforms from bench to table and back again. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Todd Toth

customer_reviews.title: Best picnic table ever!
customer_reviews.text: Greatest picnic table ever ! Easy to assemble and sturdy! Perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Manning

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most awesome little table ever! It's perfect for leaving as a bench on our porch and pulling out as a table when we need it. I love that we have a table on the porch without it taking up all the room. Will need to seal it though....
customer_reviews.author: Ben Douglass

customer_reviews.title: Love this table / bench
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect picnic table / bench absolutely love it ! I weather proofed it myself .
customer_reviews.author: Dave Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Fun. Seal first.
customer_reviews.text: 3 out of 10 for ease of assembly. I sealed all surfaces with spar urethane. Would be a 5 star had the hardware been another level better grade.
customer_reviews.author: No name

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: This wonderful bench/ picnic table was perfect for a very special lunch, when we introduced the new house to my elderly mum.
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: Love this piece!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this bench/picnic table! It’s perfect for a patio with limited space and it’s super sturdy. We chose to weatherproof it, because it did not appear that the wood had been protected. Not a big deal. Very satisfied with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lily227

customer_reviews.title: Super transformer!
customer_reviews.text: The directions and hardware were straight forward. Well packed and easy to assemble. Nice product.
customer_reviews.author: T M Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome picnic table
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my mom. She absolutely loves it! It’s hard to find a product like this that folds out into a whole picnic table and then folds back into a bench. Because it’s just wood I’d definitely recommend staining or weatherproofing it.
customer_reviews.author: Tenika Ray

customer_reviews.title: Easy built together and works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy built together and works great. The seats are good but don't seem very strong for bigger size people. Other than that great product and just want I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas K

customer_reviews.title: The tool included Is a waste of metal
customer_reviews.text: This picnic table is ok. It's a bear to assemble. The tool included Is a waste of metal. It had two spots where nails stuck out However once we got it together and filed down the protruding nails it looked pretty cute It does not have a varnish or water proof finish So do not set anything on it till you have put a finish on it For the price I'd buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It will splinter
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of it but it was missing a screw we told them about it but it was never sent. Now less than a week or so later it’s splintering my children’s fingers. It’s pine way to sold for what it’s intended for a bit disappointed
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great Picnic Table.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and everything came properly packaged. I believe the manual of instructions should include pictures of how you could convert the table in bench and vice versa. However, this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Federico Arias C

customer_reviews.title: Splitting wood
customer_reviews.text: Loved the bench when it arrived, easy to put together. Within one week the wood began to split all throughout the bench. Very disappointing. They offered to return but only if we send back, kinda difficult to send back a bench already put together!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I really like it! Good size for an adult I think. It's smaller than average as a picnic table but as a bench it's full sized
customer_reviews.author: patricia aubuchon

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this table/bench for the Fourth of July holiday ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table/bench for the Fourth of July holiday. It wasn't until the day after that I noticed a crack in the wood that separated in one of its legs. It wasn't there after building and weatherproofing it. The tabletop isn't as supportive as the benches. I can feel the wood give while climbing out of the table.
customer_reviews.author: CMN

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic table converts to bench
customer_reviews.text: Well made easy to put together We use it by our pool for dinner
customer_reviews.author: Laura Aulisio

customer_reviews.title: Love the versatility
customer_reviews.text: We bought several of these for our office. We use them all the time as tables as well as benches when the need arises. Love the versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Burns

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever! Fits perfectly on our small deck and makes eating outside possible for our family! We love, love, love these benches!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica S.

customer_reviews.title: Build quality, and material
customer_reviews.text: Very simple, still elegant for backyard. Well built with quality wood, good finish.
customer_reviews.author: Dinesh Hirenallur S

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: Took me a few hours to put together. No issues at all. Much much much sturdier than I expected! Glad I made the decision to purchase this table.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Lipow

customer_reviews.title: This is a sturdy, fun, and very useful bargain!
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy for its size. It works great and we use it all the time in both aspects of the bench and the table. We are extremely happy woth this for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie J Raudebaugh

customer_reviews.title: Defective. Had to return
customer_reviews.text: The parts did not fit. After putting in about an hour into repairing, I gave up, contacted customer support and now have to return the product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Perlberg

customer_reviews.title: ... several grandchildren stay with me and this is an awesome item to have
customer_reviews.text: This summer had several grandchildren stay with me and this is an awesome item to have! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tina B

customer_reviews.title: Very functional and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: We needed a table that was compact and this was a great solution. We normally use it as a bench.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Space Saver!
customer_reviews.text: So far this bench, picnic table has great utility and versatility. I hope it holds up well during our Los Angeles winter 😊
customer_reviews.author: Nolie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: To be able to change from a table to a bench.
customer_reviews.author: Delores Bell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have a small deck and this is just perfect for it. Fantastic item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it is so convient to switch back and forth
customer_reviews.author: Caroline R.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic bench for your backyard or patio
customer_reviews.text: Came in a very good packing. The drawings were very helpful to assemble this in an hour. Most large parts like the seat and the table top is all ready to assemble. Only thing you actually put together are the joints. It is really beautiful how it collapses to a single seat.
customer_reviews.author: Manikandan Nambiar

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and easy to move by myself ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and easy to move by myself (5'4 & 120lbs me) so I love it! If you leave outside it will need a durable outdoor weatherizing stain. I would purchase again or as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: A must have for a small backyard
customer_reviews.text: This was super easy to set up, and great quality. Smells like fresh wood! For the price, you can't beat this. I have it on my patio as a bench, but it becomes the kids table when guests come over.
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: a winner
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I use it every day. I actually assembled it myself and it was pretty easy.
customer_reviews.author: Vaughanie

customer_reviews.title: NOT WEATHERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS NOT OUTDOOR FURNITURE! IT CANNOT GET WET AND IS NOT WEATHERPROOF! I do not know why this is listed as an outdoor item if it cannot be left outdoors. I cannot return it because I have already assembled the item. If it was weatherproof'd it would get 4 or 5 stars. Also, make sure you have a power drill because a lot of the holes were not pre-drilled.
customer_reviews.author: C. Martin

customer_reviews.title: It just gave you a list of the items that were supposed to be in the box and pictures of what it should look like. If I had the
customer_reviews.text: This was very confusing to put together. The instructions were awful. It just gave you a list of the items that were supposed to be in the box and pictures of what it should look like. If I had the opportunity, I would send this back.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D. McKiver

customer_reviews.title: Not Supersized!  Perfect for the minalmalist!
customer_reviews.text: My 13 yo son assembled with ease. My 11 yo daughter painted twice without any problems! She had so much fun! Haven’t weatherproofed yet but will need to with the long rainy Seattle winter! Been using to seat two regular weight adults + two preteens. Held pretty steady and use it as a bench & table on numerous occasions. It’s a perfect size to use and stow away for storage.
customer_reviews.author: KimcheeFire

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products 2-in-1 Transforming Interchangeable Outdoor Wooden Picnic Table/Garden Bench for Backyard, Porch, Patio, Deck w/Umbrella Hole - Natural
product_meta.description:
Specifications:
Table Dimensions: 57"(L) x 54"(W) x 30.25"(H)
Small Seat: 46"(L) x 7.75"(W) x 18.75"(H)
Big Seat: 51.25"(L) x 7.75"(W) x 18.75"(H)
Bench Dimensions: 54"(L) x 27"(W) x 33"(H)
Bench Back Rest: 54.5"(L) x 15.25"(H)
Bench Seat: 51.25"(L) x 16.75"(W) x 18.75"(H)
Umbrella Hole: 1.5"(Dia)
Weight Capacity: 380 lbs.
Weight: 42.5 lbs.
Material: Fir Wood
Assembly required (with instructions)

BCP SKU: SKY2393
feature_bullets: 2-IN-1 TRANSFORMING CAPABILITY: Unique furniture starts as a picnic table and transforms to a garden bench in seconds, allowing you and guests to enjoy lunch or simply lounge outside
HIGH-QUALITY COMPOSITION: Sturdy natural wood holds up to 4 people when used as a picnic table and 2 people when used as a bench; made lightweight to allow for easy mobility
SPACE-SAVING DESIGN: Combining a bench and table together makes this outdoor furniture piece perfect for smaller spaces of your backyard, patio, garden, or deck
BUILT-IN UMBRELLA HOLE: 1.5-diameter hole in the tabletop/backrest will fit most standard umbrellas, so you can protect the area from the sun's harmful rays

PERFECT FOR DIY PROJECTS: The natural wood design is ideal for customization; paint it any color or style to help it complement any outdoor space perfectly; TABLE DIMENSIONS: 57"(L) x 54"(W) x 30.25"(H), BENCH DIMENSIONS: 54"(L) x 27"(W) x 33"(H); Weight Capacity: 380 lbs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars142 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
